- Who has (identity)
- what access (role)
- to what resource
- ![](data:image/png;base64,)
-
- Best Practices
	- always apply only the minimal access required
	- **PREDEFINED ROLES OVER PRIMITIVE ROLES**
	- child resources cannot restrict access granted on it's parent
		- ie, lower resources cannot take away access given by a parent
	- restrict who can create and manage [[GCP Service Account]]
